name: liquid-ooze

effect.sun_moon: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.

short_effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The oozed liquid has a strong stench, which damages attackers using any draining move.
